document_data.name: ''Taxidermy Knife''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Taxidermy knives''''' were specialty blades created specifically to be used by taxidermy enthusiasts of the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Description: These knives were short and sharp tools of thin and long metal blades. Many were engraved with their owner's initials due to the personal nature of such items.
document_data.Powers: The nature of such blades granted the wielder a slight advantage when crafting [[armor]], traps, and [[weapon]]s.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nagnorm Stuffler]], an eccentric taxidermist [[gnome]] from the hamlet of [[Gillian's Hill]] active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. His ''Taxidermy knife'' was stamped with initials "N.S."
